TASK: Craft an item of type: wheat
inventory=[{"type": "birch_sign", "quantity": 12, "index": 11}, {"type": "chiseled_stone_bricks", "quantity": 11, "index": 14}, {"type": "spruce_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "honey_bottle", "quantity": 11, "index": 23}, {"type": "leather", "quantity": 19, "index": 27}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 32, "index": 29}, {"type": "stone_brick_slab", "quantity": 62, "index": 32}, {"type": "hay_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "end_portal_frame", "quantity": 32, "index": 40}]
thought: To craft wheat, I need to place hay_block in the crafting grid. I will place the hay_block from slot 36 into slot 1.
act: move from slot 36 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: wheat
inventory=[{"type": "wheat", "quantity": 9, "index": 0}, {"type": "hay_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "birch_sign", "quantity": 12, "index": 11}, {"type": "chiseled_stone_bricks", "quantity": 11, "index": 14}, {"type": "spruce_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "honey_bottle", "quantity": 11, "index": 23}, {"type": "leather", "quantity": 19, "index": 27}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 32, "index": 29}, {"type": "stone_brick_slab", "quantity": 62, "index": 32}, {"type": "end_portal_frame", "quantity": 32, "index": 40}]
thought: Now I can craft wheat by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 12).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 9
